news_header: Industrial production decreased, particularly in the chemical industry.
news_text: In August, seasonally adjusted industrial production fell by 0.9% compared to the previous month. According to Statistics Finland, the working-day adjusted production increased by 2.6% year-on-year. The most significant decline was observed in the chemical industry. The value of new industrial orders in August was 5.7% lower than a year earlier, and from January to August, new orders received by companies decreased by 6.1% compared to the previous year.
